images.alt: OREO DRUMSTICK Frozen Desert Cone, 135 ml.
drumstick chockolate fudge brownie king cones

text: There’s a new way to satiate your OREO®* cookie cravings. Drumstick® OREO®starts with a crisp, chocolatey wafer cone full of creamy vanilla with lots of real OREO®cookie pieces. Each cone starts with a rich chocolatey coating, and finishes with a chocolatey nugget, for the ultimate chocolatey OREO®experience. Crafted in London, Ontario with Canadian dairy, these cones are a convenient grab’n’go size for the perfect chill-out treat.
A crisp chocolatey wafer cone full of creamy vanilla with lots of OREO®cookie pieces topped with a rich, chocolatey cookie coating
Enjoy Canada’s favourite cookie in a delicious combination with Drumstick for the ultimate frozen treat
Crafted in London, Ontario with dairy from Canadian cows
The perfect size for a delicious on-the-go treat!
